summary: The module supplies two AWS CDK stack definitions used in integration tests to verify S3 bucket public‑access settings: one stack intentionally configures a bucket with insecure public access (failing case) and another configures a bucket with a PublicAccessBlock that blocks public access (passing case).
business_intent: Enable automated validation that infrastructure‑as‑code enforces S3 security best practices by detecting buckets that allow public access, supporting compliance checks in CI/CD pipelines.
